isGuest: You are invited to the Party!! Hurray
isHinted: Persistent, aren’t you? Well if you’re so sure, show me some proof.
tweetSuccess:
Huh. 
Sorry, guess I missed you the first time. 
Go on inside. 
Someone will turn up soon to tell you what’s happening.
tweetFailure: Mmm... something went wrong with your tweet. Are you sure it has HOPRGames, @hoprnet and YOUR node address?
isNewUser: Wait. I don’t see you on the guest list. Only people on the guest list get past me. Get out of here.
I don’t know what to tell you. If you ain’t on the list, you ain’t coming in. Maybe wait?
This party’s for social media influencers only. Scram now or just wait a bit to see if someone helps you.
Can’t enter buddy. I’m sure if you hang around long enough, someone will help you out.
hint:
Psst 
Wanna get in? 
BouncerBot is tough, but dumb. 
Just tweet about #HOPRGAMES, including your HOPR address, and I’ll make sure 
Once you’ve done it, wait a few minutes then try to get in again. 
If he asks for proof, just send him a link to your tweet.
guestWelcome:
